title: Connection issue.
body:
So after the last update for some reason i have an issue of attempting to reconnect untill i restart my external Hard drive at work. I have used different computers( there are 2 in my office) and different hard drives.

I am paid to be seen untill needed so i have a lot of free time and fill it with what ever will run with out admin.

replies.body: The issue you're having does seem network related.  Regardless of different computers, are you using the same network or wifi?  On a side, while I don't think this may be a cause, running League off an external could cause problems.  It may cause your patcher to only temporarily install updates if at all.  Let me know!

I have been running league for a year or so like this. 
Its both on the same wired network and different versions of windows.
Issue only arose after the last update.

I was thinking possibly packet loss but i work for a college so its T1 internet so idk.

Thanks for the info here.  When you get a chance, run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) on some of these impacted games to give us a better overview.  Is there a possibility of some firewall protections while on this campus connection?  Let me know what you find and we'll go from there!

After talking with some of the students it seems that its an issue across campus caused with the last update. I would guess something with the networking has changed in the way the game connects to the match servers.

Contacted our I.T. to get it fixed hopefully.

Thanks for the help.
